p: The concept of syndemics has a broader reach than most anthropological ideas. It gained institutional backing from the U.S. Centers for Disease Control (Milstein, 2002); was recently the focus of a special collection in one of the world's highest‐impact journals (The Lancet, 2017); generates several dozen scientific articles every year (Mendenhall & Singer, 2020); is widely taught across disciplines (Singer, 2009); and is the basis of multiple interventions with real‐world impact on public health (eg, Chakrapani, Kaur, Tsai, Newman, & Kumar, 2020). It is clearly an idea that matters.
